text: The rugby sevens competition at the 2018 South American Games was held in Colcapirhua, Bolivia from 27 to 29 May at the Estadio Municipal de Colcapirhua. ==Participating teams== ;Men * * * * * * * ;Women * * * * * * * ==Medal summary== {| |- style="vertical-align:top;" | | | | |- style="vertical-align:top;" | | | | |} ==Medal table== ==Men's tournament== All times are local (UTC−04:00). ==Women's tournament== All times are local (UTC−04:00). ==References== ==External links== *2018 South American Games – Rugby sevens Category:2018 South American Games events South American Games 2018 Category:Qualification tournaments for the 2019 Pan American Games
title: Rugby sevens at the 2018 South American Games
